verses.content: Dân thu chun thil ṭha hung um dinghai angpui nei loin, a hlim chau a nei leiin, kum tina inthâwina pângngai an inhlân rawphai chun, a hung hnaihai chu iengtika khawm sukfamkim thei si naw ni a.
Chuong chu ni naw sien chu a betuhai chu vawi khata sukthieng nghâla umin suolhai inhrietna nei ta naw nihai a, inhlân chu an ma dai ta naw ding am a nih?
Nisienlakhawm, chuong inthâwi- naa chun kum tinin suolhai hriet nâwkna a hung um rawp lem a nih.
Bâwngchalhai le kêlhai thisen chun suolhai sukbo thei ruol a ni si nawh a.
Chuongchun, khawvêla a hung lût laiin: “Inthawina le thil inhlân i dit nawh a, Ka ta dingin taksa i mi buotsai pêk lem a;
Pumrâwhmanga inthâwinahaia le, Suol ta dinga inthâwinahaia chun Lâwmna hrim i nei nawh.
Chu phingle chun keiin, ‘Aw Pathien, ngai ta, (Lekhabu zuola chun ka thu ziek a nih), I dit zâwng thaw dingin ka hung,’ ka tih a,” a ta,

A saka khin, “Inthawina dâm, thil inhlân dâm, pumrâwhmanga inthâwina dâm, suol ta dinga in- thâwina dâm i dit nawh a, chuonga chun lâwmna i nei bawk nawh,” a tih a. (Chuonghai chu dân thu anga inhlân a nih).
Chu phingle chun, “Ngai ta, I dit zâwng thaw dingin ka hung,” a lo ti tah a. A pahnina hi ân tungding theina dingin a hmasa chu a sukbo ta a nih.
Chu chu dit zâwng chun, Isu Krista taksa vawi khata hlân nghâl lei khan sukthiengin ei um tah.
Chun, thiempu tinrêngin kâwla nisa suok tiema rawng bâwlin suolhai iengtik lai khawma sukbo thei naw inthâwina pângngai inhlân rawpin an ngîr hlak;
ama ruok hi chu, chatuona dingin suolhai ta dinga inthâwina ṭum khat chau ân hlân hnungin, Pathien changtieng a hang ṭhung ta lem a.
Chu chena inthawk chu, a hmêlmahai a kepha innghatnaa siem an ni hmakhat chu a nghâk zing a.
Thil inhlân ṭum khat chauin sukthieng tahai chu chatuona dingin a sukfamkim ta sih a.
Chun, Thlarau Inthieng khawm chun a mîn hriettir bawk a:
“Chuong ni hnunga chun, An kuoma thu ka thlung dinghai chu hieng hi a nih, Lalpain a tih, An lungrilah ka thupêkhai sieng ka ta, An lungrilah ziek bawk ka tih,” tia a hril hnung khan;
“An suolhai le an bâwsietnahai Hre zing ta naw ning,” a ti sih a.
Chuongchun, chuong ang ngai- damna taphawta chun suol ta dingin thil inhlân a um ta naw a nih.
Chuongchun, unauhai, Isu thi- sen lei chun, Hmun Inthienga khan lût ei huom a;
Puonzâr (a taksa) chu fe thlengin, lam thar le hring a mi hawng pêk tah a;
Chuongchun, Pathien sûnghai chunga Thiempu ropuitak ei nei leiin,
ei lungrila sie le ṭha hrietna faitaka umin, ei taksa khawm tui inthienga sâwpa umin, ringna fam- kim neia lungril indiktak putin hnai ei tiu.
Inhnîng lovin ei beisei thuring hi pawm tlat ei tiu; thutiemtu chu ring a um sih a.
Chun, hmangai le thilthawa in- chawktho tuo dingin inngaituo seng ei tiu.
Ṭhenkhat thaw dân anga in- khâwm dâm bânsan loin, infui tuo lem ei tiu, ni chu hung hnai deu deua in hrietin infui tuo nâwkzuol sau ro.
Thutak hrietna famkim chu ei chang hnunga thil ei suksuol ṭâl chun, suolhai dingin inthâwina um ta dêr naw ni a,
rorêlna ṭi lâwkna râpthlâktak ieng amani leh dotuhai kâng hmang dinga lungsenna mei chu um lem tâng a tih.
Mosie Dân thu pawisa naw mi chu, hretu pahni pathum amani thuin lainatna ṭhang loin an thi hlak.
Pathien Naupa sirde a, thu- thlung thisen ama sukthiengna thil narâna ruota, lunginsietna Thlarau suknuortu chu, chu mi chu ieng anga hremna nasa lem tuor tlâka ruot ni dingin am in ngai a?
“Phuba hrim hrim keia lâk ding a nih, keiin thung ka tih,” ti le “Lalpa chun a mihai ngaituong a tih,” ti nâwktu chu ei hriet si a.
Pathien hring kuta tlûk chu thil râpthlâktak a nih.
Nisienlakhawm, inhmaa suk- vara in um hnunga tuorna buoi nasatak in tuor lai nihai kha hre nâwk ro:
kawng khata chun hmusit le rinumhai khawm tuorin ennuoma siemin in um a, kawng khata chun chuong anga inhmaa lo umhai kha tuorpuituhai in hung nih.
Kawlbunhai chu in lainat a, thil ṭha lem, um sawng bawk ding chu, mâniin in nei ti hrein, in thilneihai lâkpêka in umnaa khawm lâwmtakin in lo tuor tah a.
Chuongchun, in ringna lâwm- man pêk nasatak nei ding chu peihâwn naw ro,
Pathien dit zâwng in thaw hnungin thiltiem chu in hmu theina dingin selna in ngai a nih.
“Sawt nawtê hnungah, A hung ding chu a hung ding a ni sih a. Sâwt riel ta naw nih.
Nisienlakhawm, ka mi fel chu Ringnain hring a tih; A hnungtawl ruok chun, Ka lungrilin amaa chun lâwmna hrim nei naw ni,”
Nisienlakhawm, eini chu bo- hmang dinga hnungtawl pâwla mi ei ni nawh a, hringna humhim dinga ringna nei pâwla mi ei ni lem.
